data.fullContent: Chemistry education is the study of the teaching and learning of chemistry. Topics in chemistry education include understanding how students learn chemistry and how best to teach chemistry. Researchers in chemistry education try to improve learning results by improving teaching methods and training chemistry teachers. Researchers study many teaching modes, including: classroom lecture, demonstrations, and laboratory activities.
data.answer: 化学教育是对化学教与学的研究。化学教育的主题包括了解学生如何学习化学以及如何最好地教授化学。化学教育研究者试图通过改进教学方法和培训化学教师来提高学习效果。研究人员研究了多种教学模式，包括:课堂讲授、演示和实验室活动。
